plot: Amelia, who lives in a bus station, is lost in alienation while Romaria, a candy shop owner, tries to wake her up to life.
title: Para Poder Parar o Tempo
plot_es: Amelia, who lives in a bus station, is lost in alienation while Romaria, a candy shop owner, tries to wake her up to life.
plot_en: Amelia, who lives in a bus station, is lost in alienation while Romaria, a candy shop owner, tries to wake her up to life.
